meanings.sent1: She smiled cherubically at the puppy.
meanings.sent2: The child sang cherubically in the school play.
meanings.sent3: The kitten blinked cherubically at the toy mouse.
meanings.sent4: The flowers bloomed cherubically in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The baby giggled cherubically as the bubbles floated around.

meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a cherub
meanings.sent1: The painting depicted a cherubically face.
meanings.sent2: Her cherubically features were adored by all.
meanings.sent3: The chubby cheeks gave him a cherubically appearance.
meanings.sent4: The angelic voice sounded cherubically sweet.
meanings.sent5: The statue had a cherubically expression of joy.

meanings.definition: With the innocence or beauty of a cherub
meanings.sent1: The baby's laughter was cherubically delightful.
meanings.sent2: Her cherubically smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent3: The cherubically face of the child melted hearts.
meanings.sent4: The cherubically innocence of the scene was heartwarming.
meanings.sent5: The cherubically beauty of the sunset was breathtaking.
